Question: Which aspects of the music from the film are highlighted in the reviews?
Options:
A. The title number is one of the chief songs.
B. Seductive ballads are highlighted as a key feature.
C. The music composition by A.R. Rahman is praised.
D. The soundtrack is recommended for people who love new music.
Answer: A) The title number is one of the chief songs., B) Seductive ballads are highlighted as a key feature., D) The soundtrack is recommended for people who love new music.

Answer: A) The title number is considered one of the main songs in the film., B) Seductive ballads are highlighted as significant songs in the film., C) The title number and seductive ballads are both mentioned as key elements in the review.
